title: Moneyline Monaco - Week 4 Bets: Bills-Ravens,  Broncos-Raiders, Cowboys & Eagles on upset alert?
itunes:title: Moneyline Monaco - Week 4 Bets: Bills-Ravens,  Broncos-Raiders, Cowboys & Eagles on upset alert?
description:
Alex Monaco shares his best bets for Week 4 of the NFL season starting with Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills heading to Baltimore as favorites against Lamar Jackson and the Ravens. He then turns his attention to Trevor Lawrence and the Jaguars taking on Jalen Hurts and the undefeated Philadelphia Eagles, Carson Wentz and the Commanders battling Cooper Rush, Micah Parsons, and the Dallas Cowboys in an NFC East clash, and Russell Wilson's Broncos traveling to Las Vegas for a matchup with Derek Carr, Davante Adams, and the winless Raiders. #Volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
